metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0803 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds write in tiffcrop in tools/tiffcrop.c:3516, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit 33aee127.

criterions.comment: tiff: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
